data.description:
Step into a place where the timeless art of dance meets modern innovation, and the vibrant world of salsa comes alive. At The New Salsa Academy, we proudly present world-class dance instructors Rodrigo Cortazar and Asya Sonina teach an entire beginner salsa program. They will guide you in every step, whether it’s your very first time, or are looking to improve your skills..

Key Features:

• Learn From The Best:  Master instructors appear in stunning life-like fidelity, so you can feel their exhilarating presence and appreciate every subtlety of their movements.

• Choose Your Role:  Decide whether to lead or follow, and receive tailored instruction and exercises to accelerate your learning.

• AI-Based Dance Partner:  Engage with a first-of-its-kind virtual partner, powered by cutting-edge AI that can lead or follow you.

• Personalized Learning:  An advanced motion analysis system gives you comprehensive feedback and tips for improvement. Progress at your own pace with exercises that dynamically adjust to your skill level.

At The New Salsa Academy, we believe everyone can become an amazing salsa dancer through the joy of learning new skills. Rodrigo and Asya are dedicated to guiding you through every step, turn, and twist, in a fun and interactive approach. Here at the academy, you'll find the freedom and support to explore the joy of salsa dancing. 

Join us and unlock the dancer within!
